content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No structures have been successfully placed on the map in these steps. Multiple attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) were made, but none completed due to resource and crafting issues. No other new structures were constructed during this execution sequence.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities Usage Errors
  – Use the correct argument format for get_entities. Do not supply unsupported keywords (such as “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments.
  – Check the function’s return value before iterating; if it returns None, convert it to an empty list to avoid iteration errors.

• Lab Placement Failures
  – Verify that the Lab item is available in the inventory before attempting to place it.
  – Ensure that the target placement tile is unoccupied and that all conditions for placement are met.

• Lab Crafting Ingredient Shortages
  – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients for Lab crafting (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available or can be produced via proper smelting routes.
  – Adjust resource processing (for example, smelting additional iron and copper plates) to meet the recipe requirements and avoid missing-ingredient errors.

• Iteration on None Errors
  – Always validate that functions returning lists (such as get_entities) are not yielding None before performing list comprehensions or iterations.
